Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell.
If you would like to purchase a new blank PCMCIA card, please place your order on the MyAerospace Web Portal, https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/. (For tutorials on how to create an order you can visit our Help Desk/ My Aerospace tutorials.)
You will be contacted by a customer service specialist from the orders team if additional information is needed regarding your current order.
If you need to have a price quoted, you can also request a quote at MyAerospace portal or send your request to quotes@honeywell.com.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Database Services Accounts
dsa@honeywell.com
